ComicInfo.Summary:
It all started back in 2019, Guerrilla Publishing and the Cryptic Closet joined forces to create Tales From The Cryptic Closet. The book was an homage to the Creepy, Tales from the Crypt, and EC comics of the past. The first issue was successfully funded via Kickstarter and became one of the best selling titles from the company. In 2020, the two teamed up once again, for the sequel, Tales From The Cryptic Closet 2. Tales 2 was triumphant in its Kickstarter campaign and outdid the numbers of Tales 1, overthrowing it as our best selling title. Now in 2021, the companies have reformed their alliance for the third installment. Just like all great horror franchises, Tales from the Cryptic Closet 3 will be in eye popping, retina searing 3D!!!! The latest chapter in the series will feature:
Danhausen (Ring of Honor Star, Image Comics Cover Model, Very Nice, Very Evil)
Ashley Esper (Guerrilla Publishing/ creator of The Ralphs)
Adam Farster (Floor 13 Studios, Guerrilla Publishing, A&O Comics, The Lab, creator of Humalien, Skeleton Boy and the Moon Balloon, and Dark Echo)
Andy Korty and Anna Korty (Empire Comics/creator of The Manor)
Ben Miller (Guerrilla Publishing, A&O Comics, The Lab, Enjoy Comics, Ucreate Comics/creator of Judges, Kaneessha, and Gunwork).
Bill Halliar (Professional Storyboard artist, Devil's Due, Archaia, Moonstone, Northstar, Sterling, SLG, The Lab, Guerrilla Publishing, Horrorhound Cover Artist)
Julio A. Guerra (Marvel/Upper Deck, Aftershock , Pro Wrestling Tees, Shop AEW, Guerrilla Publishing, The Lab/creator of The Epic Misadventures of Deathbag)
Matthew Skillern ( Star Wars/Lucasfilm, Marvel/Upper Deck /creator of The Comic and the Freaking Future)
Nathan Erdel (Screenwriter of Headless/writer for Sammy Terry/featured on “True Terror with Robert Englund”/Gentleman Monster Productions/Scarlet Lane Brewing)
Rafael Nieves (Marvel Comics "Hellstorm")
in collaboration with
Vinny Malave and Moses Gibson (The Cryptic Closet)
Digital is non-3D
